name: ARGonWin - Automatic Retrosynthesis
short_description: ARGonWin - Automatic retrosynthesis generator on (X)Windows: COMPUTERASSISTED ORGANIC SYNTHESIS / Chemoinformatics package to propose a chemical synthesis for an organic compound given its structural formula. (C++ XWindows/MSWindows). Based on OpenBabel.
